text: Outlaws (French:Hors-la-loi) is a 1985 film by French director Robin Davis, starring Clovis Cornillac. ==Cast== *Clovis Cornillac ... Roland (as Clovis) *Wadeck Stanczak ... Christian *Nathalie Spilmont ... Ida *Isabelle Pasco ... Sissi *Pascal Librizzi ... Maxime * ... Loulou *Joël Ferraty ... Néné *Philippe Chambon ... Eric *Didier Chambragne ... Alain *Steven Ronceau ... Milou *Luc Thuillier ... Rémi *Luis-Miguel Marques ... Bernard *Hatem Boussa ... Mehmet *Gilles Stassart ... Nehru *Kamel Meziti ... title: Outlaws (1985 film)
